doc:
Henri Pouctal https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henri_Pouctal 0 Henri Pouctal (21 october 1860 - 2 February 1922) was an early French silent film director and actor best known for his silent films of the 1910s and his directorship of the Count of Monte Cristo serials in 1918. In film, Pouctal directed about 100 films between 1908 and 1922. Henri_Pouctal ( 21 october 1860 - 2 February_1922 ) was an_early_French_silent_film_director_and_actor best_known for his_silent_films of the_1910s and his_directorship of the_Count of Monte_Cristo_serials in 1918 . In film , Pouctal directed about 100_films between 1908_and_1922 .
